snippet.title: Brocula Cinematic Trailer (WISHLIST on STEAM)
snippet.description:
Brocula is a Role Playing Game about a vampire who has been asleep for 500 years. He is suddenly awoken when a car crashes into his castle. He has been living for ever, but in modern times, his money is useless. He has no food. And his castle is crumbling.
--------------------------------------
Like the game? Wishlist now: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1364740/Brocula/

----------------------------------------
Animator: @ewwaski
